name: More Glowing Scorpid Blood
tooltip:
More Glowing Scorpid Blood

That scorpid blood is working out great, <name>!  It's amazing how a little sparkle and shine can create a prized bauble out of an otherwise piece of junk.  The patrons love the stuff, and love is what it's all about, don't you think...

You've been a big help to me, <name>, and although I don't have a great need for more glowing scorpid blood, if you bring me more then I'll still trade you some tickets.

Requirements:
- Glowing Scorpid Blood x 10
